about.title: About Me
about.description: Hi, I'm Rene Krajnc, a Full Stack Developer with a passion for building impactful digital solutions. My journey began transitioning from an infantry soldier to a software engineer, and I've since gained experience in a variety of technologies and industries. I enjoy tackling complex problems and continuously learning new skills.
